attributes.action: Better pay rates for care workers and nurses!
attributes.background: Carers deserve more, better pay, they go to work, work 12/13 hr shifts an not seeing there family, they're working hard and looking  after people, they some times get sick and urine all over them if a pacing is ill, they do an excellent  job an deserve higher pay!!

rejection.details:
The title of your petition mentions nurses and carers, but the text underneath mentions only carers. We already have a petition about pay and conditions for carers:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104368

You could start a petition calling for nurses' pay to be increased. You will need to give your full name to start a petition.
